The goal of project is been created a web-app for the life-cycle of a public work. The software manages the whole process beginning from create the main dossier as far as the more particular documents. The ECM choices is been Alfresco, that has been customized in term of content model, web-script for implementing the service for implement a datalog of dossier and Alfresco Share configuration for basic interaction with Alfresco. For the ECM integration is been created an ad-hoc abstraction upon Apache chemistry. Spring WebFlow instead was a good choice for managed the navigation page in a stateful way.
